Package org.apache.curator.x.async

Interface AsyncStage<T>

All Superinterfaces:
CompletionStage<T>
public interface AsyncStage<T> extends CompletionStage<T>
A CompletionStage that is the result of most operations.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    CompletionStage<org.apache.zookeeper.WatchedEvent>
    event()
    If the WatchableAsyncCuratorFramework facade is used (via AsyncCuratorFrameworkDsl.watched()), this returns the completion stage used when the watcher is triggered

  • Method Details

    • event

      CompletionStage<org.apache.zookeeper.WatchedEvent> event()

      If the WatchableAsyncCuratorFramework facade is used (via AsyncCuratorFrameworkDsl.watched()), this returns the completion stage used when the watcher is triggered

      Also, applies to ModeledFramework when ModeledFrameworkBuilder.watched(WatchMode) or ModeledFrameworkBuilder.watched(WatchMode, java.util.function.UnaryOperator) is used.

      Returns:
      CompletionStage for the set watcher or null
